LanguageData.FM.HelpMessage:
Welcome to the Colony Manager V2!

The colony manager allows you to set targets for production, hunting, logging and animal husbandry. Each of these can be set through the various manager screens, and accessed through the buttons at the top of the window, as well as some other handy screens. 

When you set a target, a pawn with the manager job enabled will occasionally review your targets and the colony's stockpiles at a manager's desk, and update bills and designations accordingly.

In order for the mod to work, you need two things:
 - A pawn with the manager job enabled.
 - A manager's desk.

Happy hunting!
